## Container.mutateStore() method

Runs the entire repository through the supplied fn and returns the transformed value. The transformed repository replaces the original.

Signature:

```typescript
mutateStore(mutationFn: (value?: I) => I): this;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type                | Description |
| ---------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| mutationFn | (value?: I) =&gt; I |             |

Returns:

this

## Example

```js
container.mutate("key", (currentValue) => modifiedValue);
```
